data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Maoming prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Maoming, Guangdong, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Please, convict the 34,911 believers in Maoming, Guangdong, China to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 417,854 who are far from you in Maoming, Guangdong, China from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Maoming.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Zhuang, Lianshan people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Zhuang, Lianshan people.
Lord we pray you unite the 34,911 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Maoming.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Maoming, Guangdong, China to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Maoming, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

location.name: Maoming
location.people_groups_list: Japanese, Iu Mien, Luoxiang, Hui, Muslim Chinese, Malay, Tibetan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Japanese (13,000), Iu Mien, Luoxiang (5,000), Hui, Muslim Chinese (37,000), Malay (15,000), Tibetan (2,000)
